components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hello Appcelerator Mobile developers,

In my mobile application; I am using Google Map V2, <Supports-screens android: anydensity = "false" I need to use, but android: anydensity = "false" case, Google Map V2 can not be displayed Does anyone have a suggestion?

I know some points when map appears in black 

1)For Android 3.x and 4.0.x, do not place a map view inside a modal window, that is, do not set the Window's modal property to true.

2) Make sure that Google Play services is installed on the device.


But in my project while using android:anyDensity="false" i am not able to View Maps , its appears as black screen , 

so please provide solution , how to achieve maps  while using android:anyDensity="false" .
fields.summary: Map View while  appearing blank while Using android:Anydensity="false"

comments.body: Resolving this ticket as a duplicate of TIMOB-16291. Please follow along the suggestions in that ticket.
